TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23OFPI-PROD-LDAPselect pv.segment1 vendor_number, pv.vendor_name, ai.invoice_date, ai.invoice_id, ai.batch_id, Regexp_Replace( ai.invoice_num, '' || Chr (9) || Chr (10) || Chr (13)|| '') invoice_num, ai.invoice_amount, c.check_date, ai.amount_paid, ai.creation_date Inv_creation_date, ( SELECT fu.user_name ||' - '|| fu.description FROM apps.fnd_user fu WHERE fu.user_id = ai.created_by ) invoice_created_by, ( SELECT creation_date FROM apps.ap_holds_all h WHERE h.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND h.hold_lookup_code ='HU Performers Tax Hold' ) performer_hold_creation_date, ( SELECT fu.description FROM apps.ap_holds_all h ,apps.fnd_user fu WHERE h.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND fu.user_id = h.created_by AND h.hold_lookup_code ='HU Performers Tax Hold' ) performer_hold_created_by, ( SELECT creation_date FROM ap_holds_all h WHERE h.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND h.hold_lookup_code ='MA Tax Hold' ) ma_tax_hold_creation_date, ( SELECT fu.description FROM ap_holds_all h ,fnd_user fu WHERE h.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND fu.user_id =h.created_by AND h.hold_lookup_code ='MA Tax Hold' ) ma_tax_hold_created_by, ( SELECT creation_date FROM ap_invoice_lines_all WHERE invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND line_type_lookup_code ='AWT' ) AWT_line_creation_date, ( SELECT fu.description FROM ap_invoice_lines_all aila ,fnd_user fu WHERE aila.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND fu.user_id = aila.created_by AND aila.line_type_lookup_code ='AWT' ) AWT_line_created_by, ( SELECT min(aipa.creation_date) FROM ap_invoice_payments_all aipa WHERE 1=1 AND aipa.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id ) payment_date, -- ( SELECT fu.description -- FROM ap_invoice_payments_all aipa, -- fnd_user fu -- WHERE 1= 1 -- AND aipa.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id -- AND fu.user_id = aipa.created_by -- ) payment_created_by 1 from apps.ap_invoices_all ai, apps.Po_Vendors pv, apps.ap_invoice_payments_all p, apps.ap_checks_all c where 1 = 1 And Ai.Vendor_Id = Pv.Vendor_Id and ai.invoice_id = p.invoice_id AND c.check_id = p.check_id and ai.invoice_id >= 13866203 --and invoice_num like 'DIANASCHAUB21DEC18' and exists ( select 1 from apps.ap_invoice_distributions_all aid where 1=1 and aid.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id and aid.line_type_lookup_code='AWT' and aid.description like 'MA Withholding Tax' and awt_flag='A' and withholding_tax_code_id is not null and awt_tax_rate_id is not null and awt_invoice_id is null ---- ) order by invoice_id desc
